header.author: James Mounsey
header.title: An Abstract of the Remarkable Case and Cure of a Woman, from Whom a Foetus Was Extracted, That Had Been Lodged Thirteen Years in One of the Fallopian Tubes; Sent from Riga by Dr. James Mounsey, Physician to the Army of the Czarina, Together with the Bones of the Said Foetus, as a Present to the Royal Society of London, and Delivered Accordingly in His Name, by Henry Baker, F. R. S.
